author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Coupa Software Says CEO Robert Bernshteyn's 2018 Compensation Was $4.4 Mln Vs $6.4 Mln In 2017
text:
29 AM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Coupa Software Says CEO Robert Bernshteyn's 2018 Compensation Was $4.4 Mln Vs $6.4 Mln In 2017 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 12 (Reuters) - Coupa Software Inc: 
* COUPA SOFTWARE INC SAYS CEO ROBERT BERNSHTEYN'S 2018 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $4.4 MILLION VERSUS $6.4 MILLION IN 2017 â€“ SEC FILING Source text : ( bit.ly/2HuUbWD ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
